CRW_Erol_of_Levi |guid = bec8676c-1658-484f-a894-a496d3ad7a2c }} '''Oswald''' is a character and recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background An elderly elf, Oswald is a veteran of the [War of Defiance](/warOfDefiance/) who has a lengthy history with [Kahn](/kahn/)'s noble house. After absconding with her couple thousand pires, he was captured by the [Steel Garrote](/steelGarrote/) and put on trial for oathbreaking. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Lost Dues in Good Faith](/lostDuesInGoodFaith/) |none = |other = |crew = {{crewrank|1|navigator}}
{{crewrank|1|helmsman}}
Personality: Chatty, Drunkard
{{cp2|0}} per day, +1 water consumption }} ## =Quests = * [Lost Dues in Good Faith](/lostDuesInGoodFaith/): Oswald skipped out on his loan and Kahn wants him found. ## Gallery portrait_erol_of_levi_sm.png | Oswald's crew portrait {{Crew navbar PoE2}}
